Title: Relates to certain real property capital construction costs
Summary: Provides that real property capital construction costs shall only be included in rates of payment for assisted living programs if such facilities issued an operating certificate beginning in the year two thousand twenty-one that are newly constructed or that have completed substantial capital improvements.
LawCode: Amd ยง3614, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to certain real property capital construction costs
